pkgmetadata.longdescription: fare-mop is a small collection of utilities using the MOP. 6 It notably contains a method SIMPLE-PRINT-OBJECT, and 7 a mixin SIMPLE-PRINT-OBJECT-MIXIN that allow you to trivially define 8 PRINT-OBJECT methods that print the interesting slots in your objects, 9 which is great for REPL interaction and debugging.
